hero.title: Your Local Guide in Colombia

home.welcomeText: We specialize in helping tourists, foreign residents, and temporary visitors navigate life in Colombia with confidence and ease.
home.medicalDesc: We accompany you to hospitals, clinics, and medical procedures, ensuring clear communication with healthcare providers.
home.spanishDesc: Learn essential Spanish for daily life in Colombia, from survival phrases to conversational fluency.
home.languagesText: We offer interpretation services in multiple languages to serve our diverse clientele.
home.ctaTitle: Ready to Experience Colombia Like a Local?
home.ctaText: Contact us today and let us help you navigate your Colombian adventure with confidence.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Colombia
about.description: We are a linguistic and interpretation services agency dedicated to providing comprehensive accompaniment and specialized advice to tourists, residents, or foreign clients who require support in Colombia.
about.missionText: To bridge language and cultural barriers, making Colombia accessible and enjoyable for everyone.
about.approachText: We believe in personalized service. Our core team combined with on-demand interpreters ensures you always have reliable local support.
about.teamText: Our team consists of professional interpreters and friendly locals who are passionate about sharing Colombian culture with visitors.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive support for your needs in Colombia
services.medicalDesc: Professional accompaniment to hospitals, clinics, and medical procedures. We ensure clear communication between you and healthcare providers.
services.bankingDesc: Navigate Colombian banking with confidence. We help with account opening, transactions, and financial inquiries.
services.legalDesc: Accompaniment to notaries, lawyers, and legal offices. Note: We do not provide certified legal translations.
services.emailDesc: Help translating emails and digital communications for personal or informal purposes.
services.whatsappDesc: Assistance with WhatsApp conversations and message translations.
services.lettersDesc: Translation of informal letters and personal documents.
services.hotelsDesc: Assistance with hotel check-ins, requests, and resolving any accommodation issues.
services.restaurantsDesc: Navigate menus, make reservations, and communicate dietary requirements.
services.shoppingDesc: Accompaniment for shopping trips, helping with negotiations and finding the best deals.
services.basicDesc: Help with everyday tasks like utilities, phone plans, and other essential services.
services.couplesDesc: Interpretation for couples and families during outings, events, or daily activities.
services.eventsDesc: Accompaniment to parties, gatherings, and cultural celebrations.
services.carnivalDesc: Experience the world's second-largest carnival with a local guide by your side.
services.noteLegal: Note: We do not provide certified legal translations.

carnival.title: Carnival of Barranquilla
carnival.subtitle: Experience the world's second-largest carnival with us
carnival.intro: Every February, Barranquilla comes alive with the most spectacular celebration in Colombia. Let us be your guide to this UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage event.
carnival.guachernaDesc: The magical night parade that marks the beginning of carnival festivities.
carnival.guachernaGayDesc: A vibrant celebration of diversity and inclusion.
carnival.kidsCarnavalDesc: A family-friendly celebration for the little ones.
carnival.officialWeekDesc: Four days of non-stop celebration, parades, and cultural events.
carnival.culturalGuideDesc: Understand the traditions, dances, and meaning behind each celebration.
carnival.interpretationDesc: Full interpretation support throughout the carnival events.
carnival.dailyInfoDesc: Stay updated with schedules, locations, and must-see events.
carnival.historyDesc: Learn about the rich history and cultural significance of carnival.
carnival.transportDesc: Navigate the city during carnival with local guidance.
carnival.securityDesc: Feel safe and confident with a local by your side.

tourism.title: Year-Round Tourism
tourism.subtitle: Discover the best of Barranquilla and the Atlántico
tourism.maleconDesc: A beautiful riverfront promenade with restaurants, parks, and stunning views of the Magdalena River.
tourism.zooDesc: One of the best zoos in Latin America, home to over 500 species of animals.
tourism.museoDesc: An interactive museum showcasing the culture and history of the Caribbean region.
tourism.shakiraDesc: A bronze tribute to Barranquilla's most famous daughter.
tourism.aletaDesc: An iconic landmark and viewpoint overlooking the city.
tourism.ventanaDesc: A modern park with replicas of famous world monuments.
tourism.puertoDesc: A charming coastal town with historic pier and beautiful beaches.
tourism.muelleDesc: Explore the historic pier and take a vintage train ride.
tourism.bocasDesc: Where the Magdalena River meets the Caribbean Sea.
tourism.cienagaMagdalenaDesc: A stunning ecosystem of wetlands and biodiversity.
tourism.cienagaMallorquinDesc: A beautiful lagoon perfect for birdwatching and nature walks.
